channel.title: Xbox 360: Nazi Zombiez
channel.description:
Hey moparians! lol. Well I was just wondering how many people play Nazi Zombies on the Xbox 360, and what is their highest amount of points, and their highest amount of kills.
(if you want to you can add me. My name is S41NT1Y BR4D. If you are going to add me please post on here and tell me.)
Sooo far I have gotten to: Natch Der Untoten - I think I have gotten to level 30 with 1k kills. Verrukt - I have gotten to level 22 I had about 500 kills. I did the gun glitch so I had a browning, MG42, Flamethrower, PPSH, Ray gun, and the Double barrel. Shi no Numa - I have never played berfore. Der Reise - I have gotten to 23 and I had an upgraded Browning and MG42. About 450 kills.

item.title: Xbox 360: Nazi Zombiez
item.dc:creator: @SilentCJ SilentCJ
item.description:
@SilentCJ wrote:

Nacht Der Untoten - Wave 26 - 2 people.
Shi No Numa - Wave 27 - 2 people.
Der Riese - Wave 38 - 2 people.

That was just me and my bro, and no glitching whatsoever, except maybe the multiple guns on shi no numa, but that was it.

Hate Verruckt though.

Read full topic
